name: Grassy Terrain
summary: Restores HP of grounded Pokemon by 1/16 each turn. Increases the power of Grass-type moves used by grounded Pokemon by 50%. Fades after five turns. Nature Power becomes Energy ball. Earthquake, Bulldoze, and Magnitude's power are all halved. Activates Grass Pelt.
viability: Grassy Terrain, as with all terrain moves, have interesting effects. Gogoat definitely benefits most from a partner in Doubles or Triples using this move, as it will activate Grass Pelt.
